title: Forest
body:
Forest

No one said anything, and everyone was looking at the screen in complete silence.

Even though the things that happened were very short, they were just too strange for them to say anything.

The foreheads of all the men were covered in the cold sweat, and they were sitting with their legs tightly clasped.

While all the women in the room were looking at Evan with narrowed eyes.

The status of Evan's skill in the eyes of men raised to the terror level. While in the eyes of women, it raised to the forbidden level.

"This guy is a scum" The silence was broken by Oliva who said with her eyes twitching.

She still can't believe how Evan killed that female student.

"Ahhem," Edward cleared his throat after seeing the awkward atmosphere and looked at everyone.

"Even though the way he killed those students is... little strange, you have to admit that even a team of four hunters wasn't able to do anything for him"
